00045 /**
00046  * Session backend using an Bee_Db database
00047  *
00048  * @category   Colony
00049  * @package    Bee
00050  * @copyright  Copyright (c) Army of Bees (www.armyofbees.com)
00051  * @license    http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php MIT License
00052  */
00053 class Bee_Session_Db
00054 {
00055     /**
00056      * Database object
00057      * @var Bee_Db_Abstract
00058      */
00059     private $_db = null;
00060 
00061     /**
00062      * Constructor for the class. Just sets some values for other functions.
00063      *
00064      * @param array $config The configuration to use for connection
00065      */
00066     public function __construct( &$config = array() )
00067     {
00068         // Verify that configuration is in an array.
00069         if( !is_array( $config ) )
00070             throw new Bee_Session_Db_Exception('Configuration must be in an array');
00071 
00072         // Verify that a db object is passed
00073         if( !isset( $config['db'] ) )
00074             throw new Bee_Session_Db_Exception('Configuration is missing db');
00075         if( !($config['db'] instanceof Bee_Db_Abstract) )
00076             throw new Bee_Session_Db_Exception('Configuration is not Bee_Db_Abstract');
00077     
00078         $this->_db =& $config['db'];
00079         
00080         $this->timeout = $config['session_timeout'];
00081         $this->domain = $config['session_domain'];
00082         $this->path = $config['session_path'];
00083     }
00084     
00085     /**
00086      * Loads the session from the database
00087      *
00088      * @return void
00089      */
00090     private function _loadSession()
00091     {
00092         // Check if we've got an existing session stored
00093         $input =& Bee_Input::filterInput();
00094         if ( !array_key_exists( 'session', $input ) )
00095         {
00096             $this->newSession();
00097         }
00098         else
00099         {
00100             $this->_id = $input['session'];
00101 
00102             // Grab the session data from the database
00103             $result = $this->_db->get( 'session', "session_id = '{$this->_id}'" );
00104 
00105             if( count($result) > 0 )
00106             {
00107                 // Make sure it hasn't timed out
00108                 if( $result['time'] >= time() - $this->timeout )
00109                 {
00110                     $this->_data = unserialize( $result['data'] );
00111                     $this->_time = $result['time'];
00112                     
00113                     setcookie( 'session', $this->_id, time() + $this->timeout, $this->path, $this->domain, FALSE, TRUE );
00114                 }
00115                 else
00116                 {
00117                     $this->newSession();
00118                 }
00119             }
00120             else
00121             {
00122                 $this->newSession();
00123             }
00124         }
00125     }
00126 
00127     /**
00128      * Creates a new empty session
00129      *
00130      * @return void
00131      */
00132     public function newSession()
00133     {
00134         $this->_id = sha1( uniqid( microtime() ) );
00135                 $this->_time = time();
00136         $this->_data = array();
00137 
00138         setcookie( 'session', $this->_id, time() + $this->timeout, $this->path, $this->domain, FALSE, TRUE );
00139 
00140         $this->_db->insert( 'session',
00141                             array( 'session_id' => $this->_id,
00142                                    'data' => serialize( array() ),
00143                                    'time' => time() ) );
00144     }
00145 
00146     /**
00147      * Saves the session into the database
00148      *
00149      * @param array $data The data to be stored into the session
00150      * @return void
00151      */
00152     public function saveSession( &$data )
00153     {
00154         $this->_data = $data;
00155 
00156         $this->_db->update( 'session',
00157                             array( 'data' => serialize( $data ),
00158                                    'time' => time() ),
00159                             'session_id',
00160                             $this->_id );
00161 
00162         // Clear out old sessions
00163                 $this->_db->query( "DELETE FROM session WHERE time < " . ( time() - $this->timeout ) );
00164     }
00165     
00166     /**
00167      * Gets the stored data from the session
00168      *
00169      * @return array
00170      */
00171     public function getData()
00172     {
00173         $this->_loadSession();
00174 
00175         return $this->_data;
00176     }
00177 
00178     /**
00179      * Gets the stored time from the session
00180      *
00181      * @return int
00182      */    
00183     public function getTime()
00184     {
00185         $this->_loadSession();
00186 
00187         return $this->_time;
00188     }
00189 
00190     /**
00191      * Returns the string representation of the object
00192      *
00193      * @return string
00194      */
00195     public function __toString() {
00196         //$this->_loadSession();
00197         $out = "";
00198         $out .= "<pre>";
00199         $out .= "Session Object\n";
00200         $out .= "{\n";
00201         $out .= "\t[session_id] => ".$this->_id."\n";
00202         $out .= "\t[time] => ".date( DATE_RFC822, $this->_time )."\n";
00203         $out .= "\t[data] => ".str_replace( array( "\n", "    " ), array( "", "" ), print_r( $this->_data, true ) )."\n";
00204         $out .= "}\n";
00205         $out .= "</pre>";
00206         return $out;
00207     }
00208     
00209 }

00211 class Bee_Session_Db_Exception extends Bee_Session_Abstract_Exception
00212 {}
